publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7999 Pauline McNeill: Kelvingrove, Scotland’s Number One—That the Parliament congratulates Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum on, once again, being named as the nation’s most popular free visitor attraction, with 1,070,521 visitors in 2010; notes the record-breaking success of the Glasgow Boys exhibition, which attracted over 120,000 visitors; celebrates the fact that over 140,000 people visited Kelvingrove last July to view Titian’s Diana and Actaeon masterpiece during its stay in Glasgow; considers Kelvingrove to be a perfect venue for displaying more of Scotland’s artistic treasures and national collections, and encourages the National Galleries of Scotland to participate in similar schemes involving other works in its collection.
S3M-7999 Kelvingrove, Scotland’s Number One (lodged on 23 February 2011) Kenneth Gibson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jamie Hepburn*
